name: Loper the Thief Mom (Demo)
description:
A retro 3D platformer collect-a-thon in the vein of Super Mario 64, Banjo-Kazooie, and Spyro the Dragon, but with a darkly humorous twist. Explore open 3D environments and tackle tough challenges at your own pace... all while keeping  your baby alive. Or let him die - the choice is yours.

You can follow this game on Twitteror Discord. 

I will be updating this game as often as I can to adjust difficulty and accessibility based on player feedback. Thank you to everyone for the responses so far!

Note that save data should be sharable between versions 0.01-0.03 because no changes concerning any save data have been made yet.

This demo includes the first level of the game and showcases features such as voice-acted cutscenes, unique enemies, NPCs, and death animations, and unlockable skins that can be used in New Game Plus for added replay value.

Contains mild swearing, cartoonish blood and violence, and the most important feature of all, a DEDICATED BREASTFEEDING BUTTON which allows you to BREASTFEED at ANY TIME. See that baby? You can breastfeed it. (Breastfeeding is censored by default but can be uncensored from the options menu).

All feedback is appreciated. Made with Unreal Engine 4. Retro visual effects were achieved using PSXFX by Marcis. 

A controller is recommended for this game. Some controllers such as the Dualshock 4 are not supported and require third party software such as DS4Windows to use with this game.

CONTROLS:

(controls are also viewable in-game through the Gameplay Options menu)

MOVEMENT: WASD, Left Analog Stick

CAMERA: Mouse, Right Analog Stick

ROTATE CAMERA HORIZONTALLY: Left & Right Arrow Keys

TIPTOE: Gently Push Left Stick or Mouse Scroll Wheel

JUMP: Space Bar, Gamepad Face Button Bottom

PAUSE: Escape, Gamepad Special Right

RESET CAMERA: 2, Gamepad Left & Right Shoulders

RUN: Shift, Gamepad Face Button Left

HOLD: G, Gamepad Face Button Right

CANCEL: Gamepad Face Button Right, Right Mouse Button

SHOW HUD / TALK: Gamepad Face Button Top, F, Left Ctrl

TAUNT: Gamepad D-pad Up, 1

SUBMIT: Gamepad Face Button Bottom, Space Bar, Enter

CROUCH: Gamepad Left & Right Triggers, K

As of version 0.03, the keys F, H, J, and L also crouch.
